title: Ruler
summaries: The Ruler is an item purchased from the Goblin Tinkerer.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, it is an informational accessory which aids the precise placement of blocks, and can be purchased for 1. On [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader, it displays measurement lines for counting blocks while building, whereas on [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console, it displays a grid framework similar to that of the Mechanical Ruler.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Ruler is an autoswinging shortsword and can be purchased for 10. On these versions, the measurement lines can always be toggled via the "Ruler On"/"Ruler Off" button in the upper left of the inventory.
Its best modifier is Legendary.
